title: Workshop on Mathematics Instructional Design Based on [Large-Scale] Scholarship of Teaching and Learning (SoTL) in Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and general familiarity with curriculum design
context.additional_context: Activity-centered instruction using digital devices, integrating Educational Development (ED) and Study of Educational Development (SoED) approaches

learning_goals: Explain the fundamental concepts of SoTL and integrated strategies for educational development (ED).
Apply methods for deriving research questions and conducting literature reviews for mathematics lesson design.
Design educational effectiveness evaluation criteria and utilize them for instructional improvement.

resources: SoTL (Scholarship of Teaching and Learning) Casebook

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
